channel.title: Daft Punk - Random Access Memories
channel.description:
http://grooveshark.com/#!/album/Random+Access+Memories/8814557 ^Copy whole link, won't link for some reason. Also available on itunes by search Daft Punk.
I've been hesitant about daft punk's choice to venture to the disco era, but they pulled it off phenomenally. Listening to the instrumentals gives a fine appreciation of music and the work these two put into the album as well as their work with various collaborators.
A few tracks which I enjoyed the most: Give life back to music Giorgio by Moroder Instant Crush
A few songs are paced slowly and I found them not enjoyable, but to each his own.
[left][img]http://24.media.tumblr.com/fe078c6ee77abcba0335a81a3a6823f4/tumblr_mk0z4xKJei1rbg5ufo1_500.gif[/img][/left]

item.title: Daft Punk - Random Access Memories
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

I’ve only listened to Instant Crush and Doin’ it right and those blew me away Still Discovery has to be my favorite album of theirs.

[quote=“Cres, post:5, topic:519155”]Everyone in class was already talking about their new album xD
I really liked their old songs like Da Funk and Around The World or Alive xD[/quote]
Don’t forget Digital Love/Face to Face

Read full topic

item.description:

I’m personally a massive DP fan, and this is a really nice album. Would recommend it to anyone in a heart beat, some really great stuff.

item.title: Daft Punk - Random Access Memories
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

http://grooveshark.com/#!/album/Random+Access+Memories/8814557
^Copy whole link, won’t link for some reason. Also available on itunes by search Daft Punk.

I’ve been hesitant about daft punk’s choice to venture to the disco era, but they pulled it off phenomenally. Listening to the instrumentals gives a fine appreciation of music and the work these two put into the album as well as their work with various collaborators.

A few tracks which I enjoyed the most:
Give life back to music
Giorgio by Moroder
Instant Crush

A few songs are paced slowly and I found them not enjoyable, but to each his own.

[left][/left]
